description:
After Kenshin, Saito and Sanosuke destroy his battleship, Shishio issues his challenge for a final confrontation. And following Misao`s defeat of the blind Samurai, Usui, Kenshin vows to spare the life of her mentor, Aoshi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Araf Alevler Altında: Makoto Shishio`nun Kaderi
Rengoku Enjou! Shishio Makoto no Meiun
ทะเลเพลิงบนเรนโกกคุ โชคชะตาของชิชิโอะ
煉獄炎上! 志々雄真実の命運
